snippet.title: FWsim - Fireworks Display Simulator - Steam Trailer 1
snippet.description:
FWsim is finally coming to Steam! Add it to your wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494500/FWsim__Fireworks_Display_Simulator/

It will be the same simulator that you know and love. After initial launch, we will make additional improvements. All users of FWsim will benefit from these improvements, and we will make sure to maintain the realism and flexibility.

If you already own FWsim, nothing changes for you. You don't need to install Steam. You can always download FWsim directly from the website.

Got some more questions? Check out the FWsim Steam FAQ: https://www.fwsim.com/steam-faq.html - or hit Reply and let us know!
